title: Six women among eight friends killed in California’s deadliest avalanche in decades
summary_full: Six women and three guides perished in California's deadliest avalanche in decades during a backcountry ski trip. The group of eight friends, experienced skiers, were caught by a massive slide triggered by a winter storm. Investigations are underway into why the tour continued despite avalanche warnings, as families mourn the loss of their loved ones.
